title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: The truth is not making a choice is a choice in itself. Indecisiveness about a purchase can push you to stall deliberately rather than seize a current opportunity. The Libra Moons square with methodical Saturn reminds you to err on the side of caution, especially if you think you must take a leap of faith because youre at an impasse with research and analysis. However, theres only so much risk you can ward off and reduce before youre just surviving, not living or thriving. A Chinese proverb states, Pearls dont lie on the seashore. If you want one, you must dive for it. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
